body.name: 2 Packs Yoni Ylang-Ylang Essential Oil, All 100% Natural Feminine, Intimate Deodorant for Women, Ph Balanced and Eliminates Odor, Serum (1 fl oz/30 ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 16 mins
features: ✿【Ph Balanced】Different from other hygiene products for women our's yoni oil is natural which we don’t use any harsh chemicals making Ylang ylang essential oill spray safe to use for all skin types. To help you feel refreshed and smell fabulous, our feminine vaginal oil blend will help promote balanced ph along with leaving behind a subtle refreshing scent.

✿【100% Natural 】Yoni Ylang ylang essential oil is natural-blend feminine oils extracted from Ylang ylang, Sweet almond, Tea tree, Rose geranium and Frankincense officinalis. It provides the healthy and natural way of feminine care through immersing in the bounty of nature.

✿【Soothing & Moisturizing】The hydrating benefits of feminine hygiene oil bv products coupled with the omega-6 fatty acids found in Ylang ylang extract essential oil help keep your skin and vaginal moisturized, the yoni essential oil spray is ingredients work together to deeply moisturize, nourish and soften.

✿【Improve Yoni Elastivity】This yoni rose oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and mal odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred petals with the fresh and clean fragrance.

✿【All For Women】Yoni essential oil for woman is 100% organic, hypoallergenic moisturizer spray that can help combat symptoms of BV, and menopause. The ingredients were carefully selected for their time-tested effectiveness in gently treating feminine issues like vaginal dryness, irritation and itchiness.
body.description: ✿Yoni Essential Oil is a feminine care specially developed to refresh and care for your intimate area every day. It helps to keep the microflora of the skin of your intimate area in a healthy balance by maintaining the natural PH. ✿Usage: Apply 2-3 drops to clean hand and apply to clean female intimate part or apply directly to your panty liner or pad. ✿Features & Benefits You’ll Love: ☞- This hydrating essential oil blend locks the moisture in place helping you feel fresh all day ☞- Promote skin elasticity and reduces visibility of sagging skin and wrinkles ☞- Helps reduce the visibility of signs of aging and promote smoother skin ☞- It can easily be incorporated into your daily care routine without any special preparations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my second round of Yanni oil
reviews.reviewText: The first time I ordered this, I accidentally spilt a bottle in a different brand it was too scared to use this topically downstairs in fears of Ph being thrown off . Plus just seemed a little sketched in the packaging Not understanding how something so fragrant isn’t going to mess up your pH or Cause burning . So I’m glad I got to try this again and this time I got a two pack of the yang Yang it’s not my favorite smell for sure but it is quite pleasant in this particular brand. I use it after the shower and really transforms the way you smell. I also last! The smell sticks with you! Makes you feel more confident fresh out of the shower with your partner or after the gym. I am extremely sensitive with my pH. Everything will throw me off. This has not been a problem at all while using this and I’m at almost the two week mark daily. And I haven’t even made a dent in one of the bottles! I will be buying more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Delicate Scent, and Gently Moisturizes Without Being Greasy
reviews.reviewText: This is something I never knew I needed, and now I wouldn't want to be without it!The scent is slightly delicate, beautifully exotic without being overpowering. I think it's delightful.It does indeed take care of your "sacred petals," (love that euphemism!)I'm postmenopausal, and this is very comforting. It alleviates dryness and soothes irritation.It is not a "spray," it is in a bottle with an eyedropper - you dispense a few drops and apply to skin.It is not greasy or oily - it soaks right into your skin. I feels really good on my hands, too.You can also drop a few drops in your bath as bath oil. So versatile.It is all natural organic ingredients, and also has tea tree oil, which is a natural antibacterial.This is an excellent product, and I am happy that I discovered it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time using Yoni oil, it smells great and the value for two is amazing. The only downside is I wish that it came with instructions. I had to use Google, but overall I really liked the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soothing, and Gentle
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time trying feminine essential oil and with this particular scent, I can smell a bit of eucalyptus which is a favorite of mine. The oil leaves you feeling soft, smooth, and perfectly hydrated, but not greasy. The oil has a tint of yellow to it, and with just a couple of drops, I feel clean, refreshed, and can detect a hint of the essential oil from time to time. My skin feels more supple as well, and with two bottles of oil there is plenty to last for quite some time for your personal feminine needs and i do recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells good, but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this oil, my eyes had focused only on the "Ylang-Ylang Essential Oil" portion of the title. Ylang-ylang is one of my favorite scents, so I ordered this item. Turns out that yoni oil is not the sort of essential oil that is intended for use in a diffuser. I realized that after I placed the order, but before the product arrived. I figured that I could use this product as a skin moisturizer or similar, so I wasn't very concerned until I actually received the product.I attached several pics of the product so you can see it for yourself. The bottles do not have any sort of safety seal on them. This is a deal breaker for me. I am not putting anything on or in my body, or in the air I breathe, that does not arrive with the factory seal fully intact.There is also a second deal breaker - take a look at the ingredient list. It only purports to list the "main ingredients"! A product like this should list ALL ingredients.So, sadly, this oil went in the bin. I couldn't think of a use for it that seemed safe, given that it arrived unsealed and without anything purporting to be a complete ingredient list.On the plus side, this oil smells good. The ylang-ylang scent isn't dominant, but surprisingly I was OK with that. The scent is a nice well-balanced smell. I would definitely have found some way to use the oil, given its good smell, if it weren't for the two deal breakers mentioned above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use all kinds of oils on my skin & hair. I'd never bothered with anything specifically labeled "yoni oil" but I took a chance with this. I'M SO GLAD I DID!!!! It's a great oil, and it smells so incredibly good.I can't say it performs better than other oils, but honestly, the scent is what has me hooked. I use it in my hair, along my neck, pretty much anywhere that needs some moisture. No issues with irritation anywhere I've applied it.Good stuff! Try it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This 2 pack of Yoni Ylang-Yang Essential Oil has a nice flowery aroma. Come with 2 separate larger bottles of oil with droppers. Used, not as intended, in an essential oil fan diffuser and has a nice clean flowery aroma. Can be used as intended with 1 to 2 drops on feminin pad for a clean scent. Had to use more than what was suggested for the aroma to hit the scenses just right. Is more watery than pure essential oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice smell and feels good
reviews.reviewText: This is great to put on after shaving. Very soothing and smells good.
